title: Cannabis Stocks: Focus on Fundamentals
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Julian Lin, who runs Cannabis Growth Investor on Seeking Alpha, reminds cannabis investors to focus on the fundamentals. Why the Florida market is underrated and why some are thinking about the downturn all wrong. 2022 conjectures, why SAFE Banking won't pass and long-term bullishness. Learn more about your ad choices.
